mapper.insert: insert into app_pay_config_details (app_pay_config_id, attr_name, created_time, updated_time, attr_value) values (#{appPayConfigId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attrName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attrValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert.foreach: insert into app_pay_config_details (app_pay_config_id, attr_name, created_time, updated_time, attr_value) values (#{item.appPayConfigId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.attrName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.attrValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE attrValue = #{item.attrValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

mapper.select: select app_pay_config_id, attr_name, created_time, updated_time, attr_value from app_pay_config_details
